WorkItem.Description:
The current version surrounds a notification's `Data` with HTML. This makes the `Data` unsuable for text-only e-mails or when you need only *some* of the data. Please support the following (text template):

```
@using Newtonsoft.Json
@{ dynamic data = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<dynamic>(Model.Data); }

Message: @data.Message

... rest of the template
```
WorkItem.Summary: Make it possible to access a notification's Data in e-mail templates
